section.heading: Availability of other remedies.
section.text: The provisions of this chapter shall not limit the availability of other remedies under the law or other equitable relief whether or not an adequate remedy exists at law.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
annoGroup.annotation: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3101.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition of chapter, see notes to § 42-3101.
